title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 603.10 - Payroll information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 603.10 - Payroll information

State Regulations
(a) Requests
for payroll information (name, business address, title and salary of officers
and employees) about officers and employees at the central office of OPWDD
shall be made in writing, on the form prescribed by the State Comptroller, to
the business officer at 44 Holland Avenue, Albany, NY 12229. (b) Requests for payroll information (name, business address, title and salary of officers and employees) about officers
and employees employed at OPWDD facilities shall be made in writing, on the
form prescribed by the State Comptroller, to the business officer of the
facility at which such person is employed. The addresses of such business
officers are set forth in section
603.4
(a)(2)
of
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
603.10

Amended

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
